title: Strategies for Enhancing Mathematics Education Engagement Through eLearning Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course where pre-service and in-service teachers learn gamification strategies in mathematics education and apply them to PBL projects in smartphone-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply gamification elements (badges, leaderboards, role-playing) in e-learning environments.
Learners can enhance learner engagement by over 30% using gamification strategies in math PBL project assignments.
Learners can develop gamification solutions executable in smartphone-based limited technology environments.

resources: Gamification Case Database for Mathematics Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
